00010 #if !defined(Apoxi_StartUp_hpp)
00011 #define Apoxi_StartUp_hpp
00014 
00015 #include <Auxiliary/BitField.hpp>
00016 
00018 class StartUp {
00019     public:
00023         enum Cause {
00025             NormalOn = 1,   // value must begin with 1, cause 0 is reserved for SilentReset (see StartUp::Data) 
00027             AlarmOn,
00029             ChargerOn,
00031             ProductionTestOn,
00033             AirplaneOn
00034             // INFO: probably must be expanded by currently missing accessories, which are also causing startup (see SignalHandler.cpp -> Apoxi_startup())
00035         };
00036 
00037         class Data {
00038             public:
00040                 Data() { }
00041 
00043                 Data(Cause startup_cause) { SetCause(startup_cause); }
00044 
00046                 void Reset() { m_bits.Clear(); }
00047                 
00049                 BOOLEAN IsValid() const { return (m_bits.Get() != 0); }
00050 
00052                 void SetCause(Cause cause, BOOLEAN set = TRUE) { m_bits.SetBit(cause, set); }
00053                 
00058                 BOOLEAN IsCause(Cause cause) const { return m_bits.GetBit(cause); }
00059 
00061                 Cause GetMainCause() const;
00062 
00064                 void SetSilentReset(BOOLEAN set = TRUE) { m_bits.SetBit(SilentReset, set); }
00065 
00067                 BOOLEAN IsSilentReset() const { return m_bits.GetBit(SilentReset); }
00068 
00069             private:
00070                 enum {
00072                     SilentReset = 0
00073                 };
00074 
00075                 BitField8 m_bits;
00076         };
00077 
00079         struct Table {
00080             BOOLEAN enabled;    
00082             Application* app;   
00083             INT app_cont_idx;   
00084             UINT stacksize;     
00086         };
00087 
00090         static void Start(const Data &startup_data);
00091         
00100         static void Restart(const Data &startup_data);
00101 
00105         static const Data& GetStartupData() { return m_startup_data; }
00106 
00112         static void Abort();
00113 
00114     private:
00115         friend class AlarmManager;
00116 
00117         static BOOLEAN m_canceled;
00118         static Data m_startup_data;
00119 
00120         static void SetStartupData(const Data& startup_data) {  
00121             m_startup_data = startup_data;
00122         }
00123 };
00124 
00126 #endif  // Apoxi_StartUp_hpp
